law.text:
It is unlawful for any person, in connection with the offer, sale, or purchase of any security, directly or indirectly to:
Employ any device, scheme, or artifice to defraud;
Make any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary in order to make the statements made, in the light of the circumstances under which they are made, not misleading; or
Engage in any act, practice, or course of business which operates or would operate as a fraud or deceit on any person.
